actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The vulture attacks with its beak and its talons.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8+2) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Sight and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The vulture has advantage on Perception checks that rely on sight and smell.
